list.name: Changes
list.comment: V6.1 -Got rid of maxMunch logic -Added stringReset method in HelperFunctions -Implemented stringReset within Next method -Uncommented nextMethod within Reader method -Changed NOTHINGWASMUNCHED value from empty string to null within ThreeMainFunctions -Removed maxMunch logic from ThreeMainFunctions maxMunch method

task.summary: V1.2 -Next function has base case recursion implemented.
V1.2 -Next function has base case recursion implemented. -Kind function needs to be revamped
V1.3 -Class formally known as 'TwoMainFunctions' changed to 'ThreeMainFunctions' -Next function working, need to take care of out of bounds error -Added maxMunch function in 'ThreeMainFunctions'

V1.3 -Class formally known as 'TwoMainFunctions' changed to 'ThreeMainFunctions' -Next function working, need to take care of out of bounds error -Added maxMunch function in 'ThreeMainFunctions' -Deleted 'Position' interface
V1.4 -Next function working -Need to tweak maxMunch function to append after certain conditions become true
V1.4 -PNG of the next and maxMunch logic worked out -Next function working -Need to tweak maxMunch function to append after certain conditions become true

V1.5 -PNG of the next and maxMunch logic worked out -Next function working --Need to fix repetitive chars due to weak arrayOutOfBounds manager in the base case. -Need to tweak maxMunch function to append after certain conditions become true --Working on this

V2 -PNG of the next and maxMunch logic worked out -Next function working --Need to fix repetitive chars due to weak arrayOutOfBounds manager in the base case. -Need to tweak maxMunch function to append after certain conditions become true --Working on this

V2 -PNG of the next and maxMunch logic worked out -Next function working --Need to fix repetitive chars due to weak arrayOutOfBounds manager in the base case. -Need to tweak maxMunch function to append after certain conditions become true --Working on this -End of file is now classified as a null stringbuilder value -Added new test cases and expected output text files

V4 -Code outputs -Next function working --Will not address final line of files if it is only one word due to condition put in place to stop repeating values. -maxMunch almost fixed --Output gets messy when a number character follows a letter character in a string ---Ex 'ab1b', 'ab11', 'ab11b' ----Possibly due to current logic within maxMunch -Kind function needs to recognize a null value as EOF

V4 -Code outputs -Next function working --Will not address final line of files if it is only one word due to condition put in place to stop repeating values. -maxMunch almost fixed --Output gets messy when a number character follows a letter character in a string ---Ex 'ab1b', 'ab11', 'ab11b' ----Possibly due to current logic within maxMunch -Kind function needs to recognize a null value as EOF
V5 -Code outputs -Next function needs to allow last word/char at end of lines -maxMunch logic needs work -Kind function needs to recognize a null value as EOF
